name: oraimo FreePods Lite 40-hour Playtime ENC True Wireless Earbuds
short_detail:
✔40-hour Playtime
✔AniFast™ Fast Charge
✔oraimo Signature Sound
✔2-mic ENC Technology
✔Customize Listening with oraimo Sound App
✔Low-latency Game Mode
long_detail:
Product Parameters:

BT Version: V5.3
Wireless Range: 10m
Play Time: Up to 8 hours; Case provides additional 32 hours
Input: Type-C

Model: OTW-330

*oraimo Lab test result

 

Product Features:

40-hour Playtime
Vibe with Non-stop Music

With an oraimo exclusive chip, FreePods Lite is small in size but has a long playtime. Now you can enjoy up to 40 hours of uninterrupted music!

AniFast™ Fast Charge

Charge 10 Minutes, Play 120 Minutes

Just 10 minutes of fast charging can provide you 120 minutes of music listening. You will never miss a beat anymore.

oraimo Signature Sound
Immersive in Your Music World

10mm dynamic bass drivers and composite diaphragms take every frequency to the next level. With the exclusive HavyBass™ algorithm, oraimo FreePods Lite delivers crisp, clear high frequencies and deep, rich bass, making every sound come to life more than ever.

2-mic ENC Technology
Crystal Clear Voice in Calls

With built-in mic beamforming array and AI Deep algorithm, oraimo FreePods Lite can detect and filter out ambient sounds, so the people you are calling can hear your voice more clearly.

oraimo Sound App
Customize Your Listening

Set the perfect sound for your favourite song with oraimo Sound App. Rock it, jazz it, bass it or listen in any way you like it.

*Scan to download the oraimo Sound APP from App Store or Google Play.

Low-latency Game Mode
Audio and Video Sync in Moment

Activate the low latency Game Mode for a seamless audio-visual sync and authentic game sound effects, making you feel like you're truly in the game.

IPX4 Waterproof
Not Afraid of Water and Sweat

Featured with IPX4 waterproof rating, splashes and sweat won't stop the music moving. FreePods Lite is created to accompany you through rain and workout time.

Intelligent Touch Controls
All at Your Fingertips

The force sensor gives you even more control over your music playing. You can press to play, pause, and skip through songs, or answer and end calls.
